body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15     Mission Nuestra Señora del Espíritu Santo de Zúñiga (La Bahía)                  Mission Nuestra Señora del Espíritu Santo de Zúñiga (La Bahía)        Christopher Talbot       Mission Nuestra Señora del Espíritu Santo de Zúñiga (La Bahía), Victoria County, Texas Unlike most Spanish missions excavated during the Work Progress Administration era, this mission’s extensive ruins have not been reconstructed. The ruins exist as an excellent example of unaltered early Spanish Colonial architecture. Time Period: ca. 1726-1749 Ownership: Private A Photographic Journey of the Trail - NEXT IMAGE PREVIOUS IMAGE
title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Mission Nuestra Señora del Espíritu Santo de Zúñiga (La Bahía)
